item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

Server Creator Brian:

I think that his should work. I put the plevel and action timer in the wrong spots ^^ Not good with 317s.

It’s all written in Java, with a few exceptions like Winterlove C#.

There is no difference in 317 protocol or 318 protocol, ect.

item.title: Problem that im haveing with code
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

Here you go mate.

if (actionTimer == 0) { if (playerLevel[14] >= 15) { setAnimation(625); addItem(440, 1); sendMessage("You mine some ore."); addSkillXP(215, 14); actionTimer = 7; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (playerLevel[14] < 15) { sendMessage("You need 15 mining to mine iron ore."); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Problem that im haveing with code

item.title: Problem that im haveing with code
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“Server Creator Brian, post:3, topic:315441”]No… he WANTS that, because if you have eyes…

            } else {
            if (playerLevel[14] < 15);   {
               sendMessage("You need 15 mining to mine iron ore.");

That says, IF the thing is not working above, or the reqs are not there, then to go to this. AND, it says if the players mining level IS LESS THAN 15 then to send “You need 15 mining to mine iron ore.”. It is the right way.[/quote]I realized that… That’s why i re corrected it…

Read full topic

item.title: Problem that im haveing with code
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Try this:

if (actionTimer == 0) {
if (playerLeve[14] > 15) {
setAnimation(625);
addItem(440, 1);
sendMessage(“You mine some ore.”);
addSkillXP(215, 14);
actionTimer = 7;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
if (playerLevel[14] < 15); {
sendMessage(“You need 15 mining to mine iron ore.”);
}
}

     break;

Try that.

item.title: Problem that im haveing with code
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

No… he WANTS that, because if you have eyes…

            } else {
            if (playerLevel[14] < 15);   {
               sendMessage("You need 15 mining to mine iron ore.");

That says, IF the thing is not working above, or the reqs are not there, then to go to this. AND, it says if the players mining level IS LESS THAN 15 then to send “You need 15 mining to mine iron ore.”. It is the right way.

setAnimation(625);

addSkillXP(215, 14);
actionTimer = 7;
